  asked CMake to find a package configuration file provided by "ivcommon",
  but CMake did not find one.

  Could not find a package configuration file provided by "ivcommon" with any

    ivcommonConfig.cmake
    ivcommon-config.cmake

  Add the installation prefix of "ivcommon" to CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH or set
  "ivcommon_DIR" to a directory containing one of the above files.  If
